Name: Garden, Grain & Grape
Ingredients: 1 dash Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, DRY SHAKE (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Pale green lime with frothy white head, this delicate wine and grape flavoured drink is laced with a large splash of vodka.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2012 by Mal Spence at Blythswood Square Hotel, Glasgow, Scotland.
